snippet: Factory orders rose in May in the United States for the first time in three months, which eased concerns that manufacturing was faltering.
abstract: Benchmark indexes in the United States and Europe rise to two-month highs and commodities rally as American factory orders top estimates and speculation grows that central banks will act to spur growth.
lead_paragraph: Factory orders rose in May in the United States for the first time in three months, which eased concerns that manufacturing was faltering.

headline.seo: Manufacturing Growth Helps Stock Market Rally
